reviews.review_msg: She is the only one who teaches this class, unlucky. Go to class and pray she doesn't single you out
My favorite MBB course. It's hard and you have to put the work in. Honestly not for everyone. I recommend taking 229 first which helped me alot. Get ready to work.

Would not recommend taking if you ever want clarification or asking for help. She will not help you. She was disrespectful to me and actually laughed in front of the whole class over something that I didn't even do.
Quizzes were hard
Dr. K seriously wants you to succeed. She is strict but she is fair. I will definitely take more courses with her.

Dr. K was helpful in that she was quite involved in lab, ensuring she rotated throughout labs to check in. She's a tough marker and her exams are quite difficult but not the worst prof but not the best either. As a person though, Dr. K was amusing to talk to and kind.
Dr. K is an awesome prof - she is approachable, uses good analogies, and wants you to do well in the class. She is a strict marker but she is fair. I will definitely take more courses with her.
Not recommended at all she is scary
Irina is extremely unhelpful and will disregard you when asking questions during lab. She will ignore you or tell you that you should already know this and not say a word.

Had Dr. K for 331 and 309W. Be ready to get to work. Be prepared and you will be rewarded. If you think you didn't prepare well enough the first time, reach out and ask questions. She's super accessible over email and is welcoming to questions. She may seem tough and strict, but she wants you to do well and learn from your mistakes.
Do not recommend
Awesome prof. Get ready to work. Show up prepared or you will embarrass yourself!
Had Dr. K for 222 and 309 and hope to have her for more of my courses. Expect to work hard. Best proff I have had in MBB. MBB is not for everyone.
The class isn't hard but Irina makes it over complicated. She is unapproachable and disrespectful.

309 is a challenging course but Dr. K was an engaging and helpful professor. Her labs abd exams were hard but reasonable if you prepared and studied. Averages were fair and she was very knowledgable in lab. She expects you to show up to labs prepared in order to do well. Choose partners wisely.
Class was brutal and she doesn't make it any better. Don't know how anyone can like her
I am just so intimidated asking her any questions during the lab. She will straight up not help or insult you before helping.
Not friendly nor approachable, but unwillingly helps by belittling you for asking her questions. Not recommended
I am just so scared of her.. she is definitely not approachable and makes my day hard.

She expects us to know how to submit our assignments when there is no explanation on how to do so. Our critical reviews are to be handed in paper but there are no instruction or announcement where or how the 11:59 deadline makes sense. She makes the peer review for our papers due the day before our final critical review, so we have 1 day to revise.

I really like her teaching style, it is straightforward and facilitates understanding. She is very strict but reasonable. Labs are long with some done in groups so choose wisely. There are weekly lab quizzes and she expects you to know lab content in detail (fair but time consuming).

I do not think this professor should be teaching in all honesty. There are many reasons but based on the guidelines set out by rate my professor I cannot expand. All I can say is that I do not recommend taking her.

Dr. K is awesome, she knows her stuff and explains things clearly. Great prof, would def take again. 

for the course itself: Lab reports are LONG and 2 are done in groups .... if you get a bad group sucks to be you. Quizzes are fair.
Dr. K is a great prof - very nice, explains things well, and wants you to succeed. Is a strict marker but is fair. Definitely take a class with her if you can.

MBB309W is hard but this course completely and totally prepared me for now working at STEMCELL. We literally did every technique I do everyday now. Attend lecture, prepare for labs, go to the office hours. She's awesome she knows her s**t and she will legit help you out IF you work hard and ask her.
Would give zero stars if I could. The worst. Unkind, unethical, and should not be in her position, bottom line
Her courses are tough (MBB 331 and MBB 309W) but if you put in the effort you'll be rewarded. She can be a bit intimidating but as long as you're respectful she'll be supportive and helpful.
She's extremely smart and helpful. The class is tough but she's always available to help. I would take any class with her.
Dr. K is amazing!!!!
